text:
Bodyport (YC S15) - http://www.bodyport.com - San Francisco, CA - Lead Firmware Engineer (ONSITE)

Bodyport is hiring an experienced senior embedded systems engineer to lead the firmware development of our first product. You will join an early-stage company dedicated to bringing lifesaving medical technology into every home. Bodyport is backed by notable investors in hardware and health.

https://jobs.lever.co/bodyport/
